column1: Nut roast: Set aside to cool.STEP 6Finally stir in 100g fresh breadcrumbs 150g chopped mixed nuts 3 lightly beaten large eggs 100g grated mature cheddar a handful of finely chopped flat-leaf parsley and a pinch of salt and some ground black pepper.STEP 7Stir to mix well then spoon the mixture into the prepared tin and press down the surface.STEP 8Cover with foil and bake for 30 mins then remove the foil and bake for a further 20 mins until firm when pressed gently.STEP 9Meanwhile to make the sauce heat 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil very gently then add 2 finely sliced garlic cloves and 1 rosemary sprig and heat without colouring.STEP 10
column2: Nut roast: Set aside to cool.STEP 6Finally stir in 100g fresh breadcrumbs 150g chopped mixed nuts 3 lightly beaten large eggs 100g grated vegan cheese a handful of finely chopped flat-leaf parsley and a pinch of salt and some ground black pepper.STEP 7Stir to mix well then spoon the mixture into the prepared tin and press down the surface.STEP 8Cover with foil and bake for 30 mins then remove the foil and bake for a further 20 mins until firm when pressed gently.STEP 9Meanwhile to make the sauce heat 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil very gently then add 2 finely sliced garlic cloves and 1 rosemary sprig and heat without colouring.STEP 10
column3: Nut roast: Set aside to cool.STEP 6Finally stir in 100g fresh breadcrumbs 150g chopped mixed nuts 3 lightly beaten large eggs 100g grated molokhia a handful of finely chopped flat-leaf parsley and a pinch of salt and some ground black pepper.STEP 7Stir to mix well then spoon the mixture into the prepared tin and press down the surface.STEP 8Cover with foil and bake for 30 mins then remove the foil and bake for a further 20 mins until firm when pressed gently.STEP 9Meanwhile to make the sauce heat 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil very gently then add 2 finely sliced garlic cloves and 1 rosemary sprig and heat without colouring.STEP 10

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the cockles cubes.cook the gravy till the cockles cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak cockles hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak cockles with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the halloumi cubes.cook the gravy till the halloumi cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak halloumi hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak halloumi with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tea cubes.cook the gravy till the tea cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tea hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tea with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the ghee cubes.cook the gravy till the ghee cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak ghee hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak ghee with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the cucumber cubes.cook the gravy till the cucumber cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak cucumber hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak cucumber with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the halloumi cubes.cook the gravy till the halloumi cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak halloumi hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak halloumi with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the peanut oil cubes.cook the gravy till the peanut oil cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak peanut oil hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak peanut oil with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the mixed herbs cubes.cook the gravy till the mixed herbs cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak mixed herbs hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak mixed herbs with some butter or cream also while serving.
